product_name: Komperdell Guide Antishock Trekking Pole - Single - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Komperdell Guide Antishock trekking pole helps you cover tricky terrain and features a camera mount so you get great shots of your outdoor adventures without lugging a tripod up the mountain. Strong yet lightweight aluminum construction stands up to wear and tear; antishock design helps relieve stress on joints while walking on uneven terrain. 3-section design features easy, twist-lock adjustability; staff compacts to fit into, or lash onto, your pack. Extra-light EVA foam grip provides great performance and comfort. Tungsten carbide tip offers long wear; plastic tip protector safeguards your gear in transit. Quick-release basket twists off easily so you can switch to a snow basket while snowshoeing (snow basket not included). Use the staff as a monopod by unscrewing the grip to expose the integrated camera mount. Closeout.
short_description: The Komperdell Guide Antishock trekking pole helps you cover tricky terrain and features a camera mount so you get great shots of your outdoor adventures without lugging a tripod up the mountain.
